scripts.ci: npm run ci:wdio && npm run ci:mocha && npm run ci:jest && npm run ci:cucumber
scripts.install: npm run install:wdio && npm run install:mocha && npm run install:jest && npm run install:cucumber
scripts.install:wdio: npm run install:wdio:cucumber && npm run install:wdio:mocha
scripts.test: npm run test:wdio && npm run test:mocha && npm run test:jest && npm run test:cucumber
scripts.test:reporting: npm run test:wdio:reporting && npm run test:mocha:reporting && npm run test:jest:reporting && npm run test:cucumber:reporting
scripts.test:wdio: npm run test:wdio:cucumber && npm run test:wdio:mocha
scripts.test:wdio:reporting: npm run test:wdio:cucumber:reporting && npm run test:wdio:mocha:reporting
scripts.test:lint: npm run test:lint:wdio && npm run test:lint:mocha && npm run test:lint:cucumber
scripts.test:lint:wdio: npm run test:lint:cucumber && npm run test:lint:mocha
